channel.title: Docs on My Documentations
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on My Documentations

item.description: objectives # unlink wordpress with NGINX 端口 upload static Hugo site configurate nginx 让 hugo site & other service占用不同端口 wordpress # log in to server su - author to change to the author user. Author user is for wordpress and in sudo group. Installed according to the tutorial. Database error when docker-compose. Put down first. Upload static Hugo site # hugo site generated. Then try to push to vps.

Publish Hugo on Github # objectives # generate hugo site locally push generated site - in /public to github use github page to view the site use git to push to my VPS host on my domain work # generate site locally # To generate the site in hugo, cd in the site root, run hugo, the site will be generated in /public 目录。
